title: [K-12] Case-Based Online Workshop to Enhance TPACK Confidence for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary curriculum design experience and language arts instruction expertise
context.additional_context: Case analysis of TPACK application tailored to limited-technology environments (smartphone-centric) and language curriculum characteristics.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers analyze technology-integrated language teaching cases with over 80% accuracy and evaluate applicability by TPACK components.
Participants complete 100% of technology education scenario drafts incorporating peer feedback using online collaboration tools.
Learners report confidence levels exceeding 90% in the educational applicability of technology tools in real language classroom contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
